title: Festive elf hat

properties.name: description
properties.value: Festive elf hat is an untradeable cosmetic holiday item. A festive elf hat can be obtained by completing one of the Christmas holiday events from 2021 onwards.

Festive elf hat is an untradeable cosmetic holiday item. A festive elf hat can be obtained by completing one of the Christmas holiday events from 2021 onwards.
